AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the account to which the ad belongs

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign to which the ad belongs

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group to which the ad belongs

AdId.description: The unique identifier for the ad

TimePeriod.description: The time period to which the data corresponds

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for monetary values

AdDistribution.description: The distribution channel for the ad (e.g., Search, Audience Network)

DeviceType.description: The type of device on which the ad was displayed (e.g., Desktop, Mobile)

Language.description: The language targeting of the ad

Network.description: The network where the ad was displayed (e.g., Bing, AOL)

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device on which the ad was displayed

TopVsOther.description: The performance comparison of top positions vs. other positions

BidMatchType.description: The type of keyword match (e.g., Broad, Phrase, Exact) for the bid

DeliveredMatchType.description: The type of keyword match for which the ad has been delivered

AccountName.description: The name of the account to which the ad belongs

CampaignName.description: The name of the campaign to which the ad belongs

CampaignType.description: The type of the campaign (e.g., Search, Audience Network)

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group to which the ad belongs

Impressions.description: The total number of times the ad was shown

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad

Spend.description: The total amount spent on the ad campaign

DestinationUrl.description: The destination URL of the ad

Assists.description: The number of assists (when an ad indirectly results in a conversion)

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for specific conversions

CustomParameters.description: Any custom parameters set for the ad

FinalAppUrl.description: The final URL shown in the ad for app installations

AdDescription.description: The text of the first description line in the ad

AdDescription2.description: The text of the second description line in the ad

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified view-through conversions

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions

Conversions.description: The total number of specific conversions

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for specific conversions

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad on the search results page

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions

AllConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for all conversions

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue from all conversions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion for all conversions

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the ad
